issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: "node", "machine" and "host" are the same thing with different name in this context. Consolidate them to "node".
fields.summary: Fix inconsistent naming in class ResourceRequest

This message was automatically generated.
It is OK to leave the style issue alone and not add any unit test since the patch doesn't change any logic.
Since "host" is used in many place, we think "host" should be fine, and change "machine" to "host" in patch 002.
